channel.title: GitHub Vue Daily Trending
channel.description: Daily Trending of Vue in GitHub

item.title: nuxt/ui
item.description: The Intuitive Vue UI Library powered by Reka UI & Tailwind CSS.

item.title: yangzongzhuan/RuoYi-Vue3
item.description: 🎉 (RuoYi)官方仓库 基于SpringBoot，Spring Security，JWT，Vue3 & Vite、Element Plus 的前后端分离权限管理系统

item.title: zxwk1998/vue-admin-better
item.description: 🎉 vue admin,vue3 admin,vue3.0 admin,vue后台管理,vue-admin,vue3.0-admin,admin,vue-admin,vue-element-admin,ant-design,vab admin pro,vab admin plus,vue admin plus,vue admin pro

item.title: vbenjs/vue-vben-admin
item.description: A modern vue admin panel built with Vue3, Shadcn UI, Vite, TypeScript, and Monorepo. It's fast!

item.title: nuxt-ui-pro/dashboard
item.description: Nuxt Dashboard Template made with Nuxt UI Pro.

item.title: Akryum/vue-virtual-scroller
item.description: ⚡️ Blazing fast scrolling for any amount of data

item.title: dullage/flatnotes
item.description: A self-hosted, database-less note taking web app that utilises a flat folder of markdown files for storage.

item.title: kailong321200875/vue-element-plus-admin
item.description: A backend management system based on vue3, typescript, element-plus, and vite

item.title: vueComponent/ant-design-vue
item.description: 🌈 An enterprise-class UI components based on Ant Design and Vue. 🐜

item.title: CorentinTh/it-tools
item.description: Collection of handy online tools for developers, with great UX.

item.title: pipipi-pikachu/PPTist
item.description: PowerPoint-ist（/'pauəpɔintist/）, An online presentation application that replicates most of the commonly used features of MS PowerPoint, allowing for the editing and presentation of PPT online. Support AIPPT.

item.title: jeecgboot/JeecgUniapp
item.description: JeecgBoot配套APP移动解决方案，采用uniapp架构！一份代码多终端适配，同时支持APP、小程序、H5、鸿蒙！实现了与JeecgBoot平台完美对接，目前已经实现登录、用户信息、通讯录、公告、移动首页、九宫格等基础功能。
